name: Poly4u - 3D Poly Sphere Puzzle
description:
Poly4u is a brand new jigsaw puzzle game that trains your brain!
Swipe to rotate the Poly Puzzle as a sphere until you see a complete Poly Art picture.
A whole new 3D 360 degree puzzle experience!

Poly4u is favored by all ages. It doesn’t need any skills! Massive interesting poly art pictures, waiting for you to discover!
